data.name: The Pathless - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Grammy-nominated composer, Austin Wintory reunites with ABZU developer Giant Squid for their newest, most ambitious title yet, The Pathless. The soundtrack features over 100 musicians recorded across the world, at the heart of which are the incredible throat singing Alash Ensemble from Tuva.
data.about_the_game: Grammy-nominated composer, Austin Wintory reunites with ABZU developer Giant Squid for their newest, most ambitious title yet, The Pathless. The soundtrack features over 100 musicians recorded across the world, at the heart of which are the incredible throat singing Alash Ensemble from Tuva.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 240 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1730 MB available space
